column5: My 6 year old born in Ontario.  Is he entitled to a fish limit of his own with identification.  As a " Deemed " license. ? Or is his limit part of mine.
So i can have my sport limit and he has his conservation limit.?
Full sport limit if he is from Ontario Uses part of your limit if you are from out of province
We are both ontario people. The regs make mention of a "Deemed " license for kids and seniors. With i.d. but mo mention of limits.
sorry guys i was confused, the conservation limit only applies on the "ontario fishing" days where no one needs a license to fish.  My bad!
Full limit, but he has to catch them himself. If you are catching his limit, and get caught, you will be charged with party fishing.  S.
His I.D. is required to show he is an Ontario resident.
Full sport limit as previously mentioned!
learn something new every day!! Didn't know of the full sport limit.  Always though it was the limit of person with license.
